author: Special Correspondent
text:
City Crime Branch police have registered a case against an official attached to the office of District Rural Development Agency for allegedly preparing fake certificates for securing the job.

Angeline Louisa (46) of Palayamkottai, who was working as Deputy Block Development Officer, had secured the job on compassionate grounds after submitting a certificate claiming that her father, a government employee, died in harness.

When higher officials verified the authenticity of the certificate, they found that it was forged. Based on this finding, Collector M. Karunakaran dismissed her from service and forwarded the case to City Crime Branch.
title: Fake certificate: official dismissed
